mainEntity.name: What time is check-in and check-out?

acceptedAnswer.text: Check-in time is 3:00 PM and check-out time is 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request and subject to availability.
Yes, we provide complimentary high-speed WiFi throughout the hotel, including all guest rooms, public areas, and the business center.
We offer valet parking service for €35 per day. Limited street parking is also available in the surrounding area. Electric vehicle charging stations are available on-site.

mainEntity.name: Do you have a fitness center?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our 24-hour fitness center features modern cardio equipment, free weights, and a variety of exercise machines. Personal training sessions are available for an additional fee.

mainEntity.name: Is breakfast included in the room rate?

acceptedAnswer.text: Continental breakfast is included in most room rates. We offer a full breakfast buffet for €25 per person. Room service breakfast is also available from 6:00 AM to 11:00 AM.
Cancellations must be made 24 hours prior to arrival to avoid a one-night room and tax charge. For reservations of 3 or more nights, a 48-hour cancellation notice is required.
We welcome pets under 25 pounds for a non-refundable cleaning fee of €50. Pet amenities include bowls, beds, and treats. Service animals are always welcome at no additional charge.
Yes, we offer ADA-compliant accessible rooms with features including widened doorways, grab bars, roll-in showers, and lowered amenities. Please specify accessibility needs when booking.

mainEntity.name: What amenities are available in the rooms?

acceptedAnswer.text: All rooms include air conditioning, flat-screen TV, minibar, safe, work desk, premium bedding, and luxury toiletries. Deluxe rooms and suites feature additional amenities like balconies and separate sitting areas.

mainEntity.name: How far are you from major attractions?

acceptedAnswer.text: We are located in the heart of Paris: 2 minutes walk to Luxembourg Gardens, 10 minutes to Notre-Dame Cathedral, 15 minutes by metro to the Eiffel Tower, and 20 minutes to the Louvre Museum.
